content: barefoot magnet april 2004/sally ives a fun summery magnet especially done in bright colours this is one of those ideas that hit me out of the blue love those ones magnet in worsted weight winds up about 4 x 2 ½ i did try this using crochet thread size 10 and a size 1 65mm crochet hook and wound up with one a little less than half the size i made two of the smaller ones sewed them back to back matching toes of course and attached a key ring this one i did in a bright variegated think it was mexicana by southmaid materials worsted weight yarn in your choice of colour crochet hook size 3 75mm f notes always start row with ch1 does not count as first st always turn at end of row decrease=draw up loop in each of next 2 sts yo draw through all 3 loops to start row 1 ch6 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook and across 5 row 2&3 2sc in 1st st single_crochet to last 2sc in last 7 9 row 4 single_crochet across row 5 decrease once single_crochet across 8 row 6 single_crochet to last 2sts decrease 7 row 7 repeat row 5 6 row 8-10 single_crochet across row 11 2sc in 1st st single_crochet across 7 row 12 2sc in 1st st single_crochet to last st 2sc in last 9 row 13 2sc in 1st st single_crochet across 10 row 14 & 15 single_crochet across row 16 decrease single_crochet to last 2 sts decrease 8 row 17 this is the fun part forms the toes single_crochet ch7 in same st treble_crochet in 4th chain from hook double_crochet in next 2 chs half_double_crochet in next single_crochet in same st as first single_crochet slip_stitch in next 2 sts of row 16 single_crochet in next st ch5 half_double_crochet in 3rd chain from hook single_crochet in next 2 chs and in same st as 1st single_crochet of toe twice single_crochet in next st ch4 half_double_crochet in 3rd chain from hook single_crochet in next chain and in same st as first single_crochet of toe single_crochet in next st of row 16 ch3 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook single_crochet in next chain slip_stitch in last st of row 16 fo weave in ends glue magnet to back either side can be front make 2 to make a pair of footprints for your fridge
